title: Introduction to the OpenAI Agents SDK and Responses API
author: David Eastman
description: How to get started with OpenAI's architecture for AI agents, which includes a new set of APIs and tools to build agentic applications.
cntitle: OpenAI Agents SDK 和 Responses API 简介
cndescription: 如何开始使用 OpenAI 的 AI Agent 架构，其中包括一套用于构建 Agentic 应用的全新 API 和工具。
